title: MOTHERGUNSHIP
notes: Fails to launch, 'DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine.' message given before closing.
Worked directly by just installing and running the game. No tweaks required. Performance seems a bit bad but still perfectly enjoyable. Tested playing the first few missions.
title: MOTHERGUNSHIP

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
title: MOTHERGUNSHIP

notes: There are some audio issues that can be fixed by installing xact to the game prefix via winetricks (...steamapps/compatdata/574090/pfx/). Nvidia card users experiencing poor frame rates can use the AMD spoof workaround to improve performance (https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/comments/9m18ck/troubleshooting_performance/).
